name: Readiness endpoint /readyz
description: Tests the /readyz endpoint for server readiness status

steps.name: returns 200 OK when server is ready
REQUIRE: Request should complete without error
REQUIRE: Response should not be nil

parameters.name: Actual
parameters.value: *integration_tests.APIResponse(&integration_tests.APIResponse{StatusCode:200, Body:[]uint8{}, Headers:http.Header{"Alt-Svc":[]string{"h3=\":443\"; ma=86400"}, "Cf-Cache-Status":[]string{"DYNAMIC"}, "Cf-Ray":[]string{"9bb5a99a79cb72f8-DFW"}, "Content-Length":[]string{"0"}, "Date":[]string{"Fri, 09 Jan 2026 17:30:26 GMT"}, "Nel":[]string{"{\"report_to\":\"cf-nel\",\"success_fraction\":0.0,\"max_age\":604800}"}, "Report-To":[]string{"{\"group\":\"cf-nel\",\"max_age\":604800,\"endpoints\":[{\"url\":\"https://a.nel.cloudflare.com/report/v4?s=HLrROz%2Fm8CrX9SUFLTxILBqFc7m%2F9e1pwGsPPVADL8yNeHVu%2F%2FwzSvIyAU%2BBMnnAueCHcWyJJegIZpJU%2BV6KYh1As5cbHl0JJry0TNExeFC5cAIqGw%3D%3D\"}]}"}, "Server":[]string{"cloudflare"}, "Strict-Transport-Security":[]string{"max-age=31536000; includeSubDomains"}, "Vary":[]string{"Origin"}, "X-Content-Type-Options":[]string{"nosniff"}, "X-Frame-Options":[]string{"SAMEORIGIN"}, "X-Request-Id":[]string{"009d172bca78f6caf4a1c5d249837f2c"}, "X-Xss-Protection":[]string{"1; mode=block"}}})
